about.author: Tim Stephenson
about.name: Submit a Powerful Point
about.title: Do you have a powerful point to share with others?
about.instructions: If you complete the form below we add it to the library for others to use too. Please note: We do review these submissions by hand so it may take us a few days to get back to you.

questionsTitle: Please tell us about your point

questions.name: name
questions.hint: A short, high-impact headline for your point
questions.label: Headline

questions.name: link
questions.hint: A link to the source or reference of your point
questions.label: Link

questions.name: paywall
questions.hint: Tick if the link is behind a paywall
questions.label: Paywall?

questions.name: featuredImage
questions.hint: Link to a high-definition image that supports or illustrates your point
questions.label: Featured image

questions.name: description
questions.hint: The key information summarising your point, no need to duplicate all of the content of the link!
questions.label: Description

questions.name: moreInfo
questions.hint: Anything else? Again please don't simply repeat the content of the link.
questions.label: More information

questions.name: reference
questions.hint: The source of the point to reference
questions.label: Reference

submit.text: Thanks for your point, we will get back to you in the next few days.
submit.title: That's it!
